ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | topbnd.1 | |- X = U. J |
| 2 | 1 | #P_clsdif | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A C_ X ) -> ( ( cls ` J ) ` ( X \ A ) ) = ( X \ ( ( int ` J ) ` A ) ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_ineq2d | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A C_ X ) -> ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) i^i ( ( cls ` J ) ` ( X \ A ) ) ) = ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) i^i ( X \ ( ( int ` J ) ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_indif2 | |- ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) i^i ( X \ ( ( int ` J ) ` A ) ) ) = ( ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) i^i X ) \ ( ( int ` J ) ` A ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A C_ X ) -> ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) i^i ( ( cls ` J ) ` ( X \ A ) ) ) = ( ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) i^i X ) \ ( ( int ` J ) ` A ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_clsss3 | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A C_ X ) -> ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) C_ X ) |
| 7 |  | #P_df-ss | |- ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) C_ X <-> ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) i^i X ) = ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) ) |

| 9 | 8 | #P_difeq1d | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A C_ X ) -> ( ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) i^i X ) \ ( ( int ` J ) ` A ) ) = ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) \ ( ( int ` J ) ` A ) ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A C_ X ) -> ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) i^i ( ( cls ` J ) ` ( X \ A ) ) ) = ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) \ ( ( int ` J ) ` A ) ) ) |
